reviews.review_text: Great tasting food overall. Our group of 4 colleagues tried 4 different dishes and it did not disappoint at all. Our only comment is that the lunch portions are a bit small. Expect to spend about $30 to $40 per person (as of September 2023)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Timothy, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: We went for a girls night at the restaurant. We had no idea what to expect. We ordered calamari, burrata, carpaccio, scallop ravioli, spot prawn spaghetti, mini donuts and a chocolate hazelnut dessert. Everything we had was really good.  The seafood was cooked perfectly! We also ordered non alcoholic mocktails. One of the drinks tasted too much like vanilla so the bar tender came over and made a new drink for my friend. The staff were very friendly and the atmosphere is good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Anne, We love 5 star reviews! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your great experience. I have shared this with the team and they are delighted. Please join us again soon for another girls night! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: I had a fantastic dining experience at Bacaro! This modern Italian restaurant captures the essence of Venetian bacaros beautifully by letting simple ingredients shine in the most delicious ways. The dishes I tried, like the charred octopus and the lightly spiced duck ragu, and the linguine ai gamberi were all exceptional, but what truly stood out was Chef Charlies talent and care. His culinary skills shone through in every bite, making this meal unforgettable. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Afkar, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: The place is great, good ambience during the day, service is top notch, the waiter prepared for us extras that werent accessible. The regatoni is a solid 8/10 and the tiramisu was definitly a  8.5/10 compared to italy. Overall its a good italian experience in a great location.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi AHMAD, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: Found this gem of a tapas/Mediterranean resto while browsing Michelin s recommended list for Vancouver. Then later stumbled by it late at 9pm and stopped in and glad we did. It s attached to a hotel sort of but under completely different ownership. Service was even better than the solid food. The one cocktail we ordered was good but they make it in house ahead of time and bottle it, so not my ideal drink but still was very good. Have a small patio that is awesome and inside decor is nice too. Very fair prices so a good value for a nice do inexperience. Hopefully we will be visiting Vancouver again soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Scott, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: We were celebrating our 9th month anniversary there, food was amazing! I love the branzino dish. I ll recommend it to friends.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Sugartapes, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: The overall menu is a little limited. The night started out not pleasant but the manager, waitress and kitchen staff made everything ok!  by night s end. Sparing you the minor incident - the restaurant ran out of the small size 20oz Ribeye - the manager made right and gave a small discount on a larger 40oz Ribeye.  Hindsight if I had more than 2 people like 3-4 I would definitely order 40+ oz.  Steak was about 10% fatty and cooked med rare could give Morton s or Ruth s Chris a run for their money.  Accompanied by carrots with chimichurri sauce and rosemary over crisped potatoes and a small side of Rigatoni with olive oils and Parmesan slices - and sprinkle some salt flakes - ciao!!  Delicious!! Thank you Jesse and Morgan for a delightful service and finished with donuts on lemon curd!! I m visiting from Los Angeles - and I travel a lot.  This restaurant is special!! Ciao!! Vegetarian options: Lots of veg options Kid-friendliness: Friendly menu and kitchen staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sherman, It was a pleasure to host you. Thanks for being so understanding and letting us take care of you. We really appreciate the recognition. We hope to have you back again in the future. Safe travels! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: We loved the cichetti - try the anchovy and butter! Lambrusco spritz was a lovely change. Pistachio gelato also a hit. Have been several times and the staff here make it always a winner. Vegetarian options: Lots of options except in the domain of pasta - only the Sbocciare is vegetarian.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Adrienne, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: This place seriously knows how to bring the flavor and create an amazing atmosphere that had us swooning. First things first, the scallops and raviolo were the real deal.   The combination of delicate scallops and perfectly cooked raviolo had us in foodie heaven. It was like a symphony of flavors that danced on our taste buds, leaving us craving more. And those chicken liver crostini and anchovy crostini? Lets just say they were the definition of gourmet deliciousness. We gotta give a shout-out to their strawberry iced tea because it was the ultimate thirst-quencher.    It was so refreshing, like a fruity oasis in the midst of our dining adventure. Now, lets talk about the spot prawn pasta.    It was a serious game-changer! The spot prawns were cooked to perfection, and the pasta was an explosion of flavors that kept us coming back for more. Trust us, this dish will have you doing the happy dance in your seat. Moving on to the service can we just say that the servers were on point? They were friendly, approachable, and totally on their A-game. They made us feel right at home, and their knowledge of the menu was impressive. Its clear that they take pride in delivering a top-notch dining experience. And lets not forget the ambiance. It was pure romance in every detail. The dim lighting, cozy seating, and overall vibe set the stage for a memorable evening. Whether youre out for a date night or catching up with friends, Bacaros ambiance is on another level. So, if youre looking for a dining spot that hits all the right notes, Bacaro is a must-try. The scallops, raviolo, and crostini will make your taste buds sing, the strawberry iced tea will quench your thirst, and the spot prawn pasta will leave you wanting more. The servers and romantic ambiance are the icing on the cake. Trust us, youll leave with a smile and a full heart (and stomach)!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Justinne, Well, this may be one of the best reviews ever. Thank you so much for this love and taking your valuable time to put together this detailed review. I have shared this with the team and they are delighted. We certainly hope you can come back and join us again soon so you can try some new dishes. Thanks again, Justinne! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: We decided to try out this restaurant because it s Michelin guide reccommended! We ordered the Rosato Spritz, which is house bottled and labelled. Cute touch! It was sweet and easy drinking. Our reservation was for 8:30 and by that time, they were out of their homemade bread and their sirloin. Thankfully they still had a ribeye available. It was my favorite dish of the night! The ribeye is sous vide and finished on the grill which was exquisite - sooo tender. However, we did have to ask for some salt on the side as it was under-seasoned for our liking. In place of the bread & butter, we tries the Saffron Pecorino - very tasty! We enjoyed the accompanying Peach Mostarda - very sweet and strongly flavoured. We were told ahead of time that their Duck Ragu Bigoli is more aldente than we would be used to which was appreciated. It was good but not the favourite of the night. The Fritto Misto was delicious and had great portions! All the assortments of seafood were cooked perfectly. The breading has more of a bite than you would expect. Definitely worth a try! The ambience was dark and intimate.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vivian, Thank you so much for the detailed review. You will have to come back again soon to try some new dishes and drink some wine! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Third visit since January. Convenient location with a good amount of food menu items and wine list with depth. Wait staff is attentive and never feels intrusive while eating. Each visit has been better than the last. It can get a little loud with the low ceiling, but it adds atmosphere. I prefer to sit earlier in the evening for a quieter meal and more personal service from the staff. The sablefish risotto is to die for. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Michael, Thanks so much for this great review! We are glad you continue to come back and support us and enjoy a great experience. We look forward to your next visit with us! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: I shared a fantastic meal with a friend last night at Bacaro. From the service to the food, it was delightful. I especially enjoyed the sbocciare - not a style of pasta Id ever tried before! If I had to choose something to change, I personally felt that a tiny sprinkling of salt would have elevated the flavours in the caprese salad, but thats an opinion.

Came around 3pm, and even tho they were just serving aperitivos the staff was very accommodating with us! Ended up having the Rigatoni Al Cervo and the Scampi Linguine, both were delicious. They have a great deal on their aperitivo hour where you get a free small snack if you order a drink from the aperitivo menu. In general the staff was great, but shout out to Hector and Logan, both gave us great service and an all around amazing experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Pepe, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: They recently changed their menu and everything we tried was really delicious. Highlights were the Branzino, pasta, and octopus. Even the salad was hearty and flavourful!  Finished off with the doughnuts and lemon curd - soft, chewy, and warm...a must if you like doughnuts. Ambiance was cozy and good spacing between tables. Service was friendly but could use a bit of improvement in some areas.  Otherwise a really great experience and will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Melanie, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Sablefish risotto was excellent. Flavourful and just in the sweet spot for texture. Sauce for the dish was what tied it all together in a top notch dish.  Our table also ordered a couple of cheeses on the servers recommendation.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Eric, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Definitely award winning!! Hats off to the chef!! The calamari and the tuna are amazingly scrumptious!! So is the prawn linguine!! Delicious. Great staff!! Great service! Amazing desserts!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anshu, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: What a delightful evening! The food turned out to be surprisingly good, earning a 9 out of 10 from me. The only aspect that fell short, in my opinion, was the size of the portions. They were quite small, particularly considering the prices. I ordered an appetizer, a main course, and dessert, and all of them were on the smaller side. Im not a big eater, and I usually find portions to be too large, but this time was different.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Emerson, Thanks so much for the review. We also appreciate the feedback on the portion sizes. I have relayed this feedback to my Chef. We hope to have you join us again in the near future! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: Although I did not get to experience dining here personally, I just want to give a huge shoutout to the staff at Bacaro (esp Jesse) who fit in a large group of us for lunch today, very last minute, despite being a smaller establishment and being short staffed. Jessie was so friendly and accommodating and I can confirm that the group who did dine here LOVED the food, and despite the restaurant being short staffed, gave rave reviews of their service. 10/10 would recommend, and hope I get the chance to try the food soon! Thanks Jesse!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Meghan, Thanks so much for this great review. I am so glad we were able to accommodate your group last minute and even happier that everyone who visited had such great things to say. Please dont hesitate to reach out if you would like to join us one day. All the best! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: One of the best americanos I have ever had , hands down. Located as part of the pacific rim hotel, the atmosphere is relaxed but sophisticated. I loved most of the the things we were served but certain pasta dishes were not to the best of my liking.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Harpreet, Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. I agree, the Americano is amazing. We hope to see you again soon! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: Really lovely pasta dishes that are way more filling than they look. The little donuts with lemon were delicious too. Only weird thing is the s&m style meat locker in the middle of the restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Laine, Thanks for the review. We are very glad you enjoyed yourself. As for the meat locker, it is a space for curing meats and cheeses. I can see how it looks a bit suss. Please come join us again soon for some new dishes! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: We had a group birthday party over the weekend and had fantastic service. Since it was such a large party, we had a family style set menu that accommodated all dietary and chosen restrictions in the back part of the restaurant. Service was wonderful from Maisie (apologies on spelling if incorrect). We tried our best to stay in the same seats but she got everything correct upon billing anyways. Since we were staying in the Pac Rim, it was handy to not have to leave the hotel and we were glad we chose to dine there. Thanks again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Meg, Thanks so much for the amazing review. This is exactly what we are going for. You also nailed Maisies spelling. Please reach out in the future if you would like to return, we would love to have you! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Taste so good and friendly service as well. Everything was tasty and not small portions!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello mzw, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Just finished a fantastic dinner at Bacaro. Jesse and Morgan took really good care of us. The fritto misto and salumi were good but the bistecca was the star of the show. The best steak I ve had in the last couple of years. Highly recommended. Will be returning for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, Thanks so much for this gracious review. We are very glad you had such a great time. Morgan and I definitely appreciated the love. We anticipate your return. See you soon, James! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: I planned a last minute staycation @ Fairmont Pacific Rim. I took the advice of the hotel staff and tried out this restaurant. All I have to say is WOW! From the service, to the experience, and then the food !!!! 5 stars Very tentative to detail and made sure I didn t have any allergies. Thank you for a great experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello SIM, We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We love taking care of our guests at Bacaro and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Delicious food! Elegant ambient. Amazing services. We loved dining here. Well deserved 5 stars.
Great little gem of a place. We recently hosted a reunion there. Jon and the team are and absolute pleasure to work with and Logan with the rest of the team behind the bar make some amazing cocktails
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrei, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: An absolutely fabulous meal in a really chic restaurant with a great vibe. Super friendly and attentive service. Really loved their elegant dim sum / tapas style dishes. Perfect for sharing. Some of the outstanding highlights included their potato chips, Culatello di Modena, Truffle burrata and Risotto di go. The finest interpretation of Venitian Bacaro food I have ever had and a must return next time we are in town!

Hosted a birthday party here for 30 people in the semi private space in the back. Can t say enough good things about the very hard working GM who was very helpful prior in planning the event including a family style menu. The servers were great and everyone kept praising the service. Thanks for a great experience. Well worth the value.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Fergus! It was a pleasure hosting your group. Please feel free to reach out in the future if you or any of your friends would like to book a small event! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Bacaro is a welcome addition to the Vancouver food scene. High quality familiar Italian ingredients - with a sprinkle of less familiar touches. The subtle touches/inventions are great elevations to traditional dishes. From the menu to wine list (including tasting flights and amaros) there is lots of entertainment to be had. We ve been back twice and we will certainly be returning again. Our initial experience included the risotto and the duck ragu (both excellent, particularly the pasta itself which reminded me of picci pasta in Tuscany). This most recent visit included venison and rosemary ragu rigatoni; chicken (breaded and fried) with polenta, sweet onion reduction, and hen of the woods mushrooms; tiramisu (with preserved cherries and chocolate at the bottom); Piedmonte wine tasting flight; and a side of Taleggio with rhubarb preserve finished with a glass of Cappellano chinoto (a true gem and difficult to source). We were also lucky enough to have a seat on their newly updated patio equipped with heaters. Thank you Zeenah and Hector for making our daughters 1st birthday lunch memorable. Salute!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Fatgrape, What an amazing review. Thank you so much. I have shared this with my team and they are delighted. We surely hope you join us again soon. Come and check out what dinner is like at Bacaro! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Friendly service, amazing dishes. It was the best caprese ever. We enjoyed the dinner. Thank you!

Great experience! Our server made excellent recommendations on the menu. Fantastic pasta! We were also very pleased that when we asked for a comfy seat for my very pregnant wife, they were able to accommodate. Classy without feeling pretentious at all, it felt like more of a home cooking type of restaurant. Would recommend.

My girlfriend and I often like to go to high end restaurant s throughout the city. We decided to go to Bacaro for her Birthday and we cannot wait to go back. Italian is our favourite cuisine.  I cannot name an Italian place we haven t been in Vancouver. Bacaro is by far our favourite so far though we thought we had already had the best. Our service was amazing, honestly the perfect waitress for our evening and we would definitely ask to have her again! The food was absolutely to die for we both had the stable fish as our entre and could not have been more pleased. This is an absolute must try for food lovers!!!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kyle, WOW! Thank you so much for the kind words. I have shared this with my staff and they are very happy. please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Whoa! Their Braised & Grilled Wagyu Beef was so tender and rich! It was total bliss in your mouth! They can really cook meat :)
Evry dish was a hit. Service was awesome. Wine list on point. 10/10
I like their tapas style appetizers. Everything on the dinner menu are worth trying.

Experience was amazing. My girlfriend and I got a bunch of plates to share and everything was delicious. We had the duck ragu, salami and mushrooms, a deep fried cheese sandwich, bread and oil and a farro salad and it was all great. Main thing though was the service was amazing! They gave us great recommendations for food and wine and were just generally great to talk with. will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cameron, Hi Cameron! Thank you for sharing your positive thoughts and vibes.  We are so glad you felt this way during your visit! Please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: We stopped by for a glass of wine (been here before. Not best food but great wine selection) and met John. He was knowledgeable, kind, and very passionate. One glass of wine became many and found a couple of wine we really like thank you John. I strongly recommend trying this place if you love wine.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jenna, We love positive feedback. Thank you so much. We have lots of wine waiting for you when you return! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Very lovely dining experience. Came on a Wednesday night and sat at the bar. Had a wonderful chat with Chef Scott about his menu contents and philosophy. Food presentation was pretty and fun. Excellent ingredients meticulously prepared made for an exceptional set of courses. Cant wait to come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Patrick! Thank you for this. Please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: My husband and I had an amazing date night. Every single dish was delicious as was the wine pairing. Our service was fantastic and we can t wait to enjoy another meal at Bacaro!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kristine, Wow, thank you so much for the kind words. We are so grateful that we got to create a special experience for you. We cant wait to have you back! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Excellent seasonal menu and cocktail selection. Carpaccio and cicchetti are must-tries.

John was so passionate about his wines- definitely contagious!  There is nothing better than getting to sample glass after glass of unique and beautiful big Italian red wines.  Thank you John for a truly memorable wine bar experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sierra, Thank you for this great review. We are very happy that Jon created an amazing experience for you! Please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Jesse and the whole team went out of their way to make an awesome experience. I was dining with a friend I hadn t seen in a while so we were one of those annoying tables that chats forever and takes a while to order. But we never felt rushed and the service was spot on. Food is outstanding - highly recommend the sbocciare pasta - seriously what dreams are made of.

Although nominally in the Fairmont Waterfront Hotel, this is a casual street-side dining spot accessible directly off West Cordova. Very interesting Italian lunch menu. Food was excellent. Very good, friendly service.  Good selection of cocktails and wine by the glass.  This place is relatively new but deserves to be busier and  found by  the downtown lunch crowd as people return to the office.
Brilliant! Enjoyed everything and was thoroughly impressed by food and service! Would go again to try other food items and enjoy excellent wine selection.q
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason, Thanks for the love. This is exactly what we strive for every single interaction and table. Thanks for taking the time to share this. Please do not hesitate to reach out if you would like to join us again. We would love to host you! All the best! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: Lovely restaurant, delicious food and accommodating manager Mathilde combined for a wonderfully memorable experience! From the small bites, so perfectly sized and so amazingly delicious, to an equally delectable dinner, my best friend and I couldn t be more pleased with this gem of an eatery. Merci, Mathilde, for having taken such good care of us.
Delicious spot for a quick snack when browsing around Vancouver. Servers were very nice and the chips with tonnato and polpette di funghi hit the spot.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Rishy, We love appreciative, 5-star reviews. Thanks for taking the time to spread some love. We hope to have you back again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: This was my first dining experience at Bacaro, but the food more than lived up to the great reputation of the restaurant. The service was great as well.  I hope to return to dine there again at some point!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jonathan, Thank you so much for the great review. Please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Dropped in tonight with no reservations but were accommodated at the bar. Lovely, warm atmosphere. Ordered Negroni Sbagliatti from the extensive drinks menu: delicious! Had the anchovy and butter crostini and 2 pastas. The raviolo with black truffle was divine!! Do yourself a favour  and have the fritelle for desert. Will be going back tomorrow for another round!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Giovanni Cinel, Thanks so much for the review! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Excellent meal overall. The chicken liver and the risotto (great balance between the richness from the cheese and the acidity from the berry) were my favorite. The tiramisu was solid too. Also enjoyed looking at the interior decor of the restaurant while I was waiting for my food (didnt have to wait too long, the food was brought out fairy quick).

Went for my birthday dinner. Fantastic customer service and food was lovely. Zeenah our server was so nice and made it a special experience. We decided to share everything and I highly recommend you go this route. The polpette is a must try.

This was without a doubt, the most memorable meal I had in Vancouver during my most recent trip! Truly a hidden gem! Gorgeously decorated restaurant, impeccable service and a really well thought out and executed menu. I still think about the chicken liver crostini, anchovy crostini and the chocolate and hazelnut semifreddo.

We chose this restaurant because we knew they had a more tapas style menu. We d had a late lunch, so were looking for a smaller dinner. It was excellent. Well composed, creative, and interesting small plates. Would recommend!

Fine dining, fantastic service but without the stuffy vibes that are normally associated with that level of food and service. We were so, SO pleasantly surprised and will absolutely be back when in Vancouver again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bryan, So much joy to read a review like this. We are so delighted that you enjoyed yourself and cant wait to have you back again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Service and staff were friendly and inviting. The food is fantastic. Appropriate portion sizes and perfect sharing dishes. Flavours and ingredients compliment each other well. Definitely an elevated version of the Venetian bacaros. Great to see uncommon Italian wines as well

Its been a long time since weve gone out for dinner and received such amazing service along with fantastic food. Bacaros staff make you feel cared for and attended to - cannot wait to go back and try more of the menu
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Emily, thanks so much for taking the time to leave a great review. We are delighted by your comments. We cant wait to have you back again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: I had a Holiday 3-course lunch, very delicious meal.  Staff were warm-welcoming and very good services. The ambience is unique. I love it and will definitely come back! Parking: Fairmont Pacific Rim Hotel parking and street parking are available for dinners. Wheelchair accessibility: There is a drop-off zone at the main entrance of the hotel to access to the restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cecilia, Thank you so much for the glowing words! We cant wait to have you back again so you can enjoy another amazing experience! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Punching way above their weight here with Venetian-Italian dishes done impeccably well. From pristine small bites to indulgent pastas and ingenious bits like the XO-inspired baci baci sauce, everything we ate was perfect. The food was only topped by the uber-attentive and informative service. Excellent wine list a bit off the beaten path, but with excellent guidance. Cant recommend enough, total hidden gem.
Very enjoyable meal. Great wine recommendation. Nice options for tapas style bites, sharable apps and mains. Great service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Adam, The kind words are more than refreshing and appreciated. Thank you and please come say hello soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Truly phenomenal architecture. Also, the risotto was delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan, Thank you for you for visiting us at Bacaro and for your kind words!

reviews.review_text: Delightful gem in Coal Harbour! Its clear the chef and staff pay attention to the details and the experience was superb. The smoked duck ragu was sublime. Strongly recommend!

I have been happily dining at Bacaro since it opened. Consistently delicious. The specials are always quite special & a taste sensation. The wait staff are attentive & seem to love working at Bacaro. Can t wait for my next dining experience there.
YUM! Will be back for some more duck ragu and pistachio gelato :) Thanks for an amazing dinner!

Whether its a date night, a friends night, a casual night out or any type of celebratory night out, Bacaro delivers each and every time! My husband and I love, love, love Bacaro so much! Phenomenal experience each and every time we visited this wonderful place. Consistently outstanding food, which is not a guarantee at so many other restaurants we go to. We tried so many different dishes and so far, we loved each and every one of them. I normally stay away from onions, because they simply dont like me very much, BUT, we both had the Manzo - braised and grilled wagyu beef, balsamic cipollini onion, farm lettuces, and we both thought that the balsamic cipollini onion was as much of the star in this dish as the wagyu beef! Simply delicious! And....for the first time ever, I never experienced any side effects from the onion whatsoever! The staff is truly amazing; knowledgeable, pleasant, friendly and fun! Rebecca made our experience fun, beautiful and memorable. Top notch atmosphere and vibe! We cant wait to go back again, again and again... Petra Belavic is the general manager at Bacaro, and was amazed that she reached out just to thank me for the feedback, and to let her know if there was anything she could do for us in the future. So caring, so wonderful.... these are the experiences that make ALL the difference, Thank you! Many THANKS Petra, to you and to your wonderful staff for all the wonderful work you do and for making it so easy to leave positive feedback and reviews like this!  Keep up the amazing job you are doing! We will see you again very, very soon! J and C, Vancouver
We had a great meal at Bacaro. Service was great! I think the duck ragu was one of the best mains. I also enjoyed the burrata with bread and olive oil
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jessica, Thank you for taking the time to leave some praise! We hope to host you again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: All the staff are very nice and every suggestions were excellent. Especially Rebecca, thank you so much. Drinks, service, the whole meal was so worth it! Quels beaux melanges de textures et de saveurs

Great food and beautiful interior. Good place for a cute date night. I loved the Bigoli con Anatra was flavourful and an overall delicious pasta if you like duck. If you love seafood you must order the Moscardini the squid was amazing! The service was 10/10 our server made great recommendations and I will be coming back ASAP!!

A hidden gem located inside the Fairmont Pacific Rim! Great little spot to go for small bites or full on dinner! Small but very decent wine list! Service is very professional and attentive. Will be back again soon!
Love this place for the small plates and delicious secondi dishes!

Tried this restaurant for my birthday dinner and was very impressed. The Lambrusco Spritz was delicious and loved the salumi and mortadella. Our server was very attentive and was able to walk us through the menu and provide us with recommendations to make a memorable meal!

Having visited many bacaros in Venice myself, I was so excited to visit this new concept in Vancouver, and I wasn t disappointed. Make sure you ask your server to go through the menu  with you if you aren t familiar with bacaros! Fantastic food from start to finish! We enjoyed a variety of cicchetti (small cocktail snacks) to kick off our evening. Some of our favourites were the butter and anchovy, Buffalo mozzarella, and polpettes, which paired well with my refreshing V&T. Appetizer favourites include the beef carpaccio, smoked sablefish, and insalata di cicoria. For the mains, I loved the fresh bigoli pasta, risotto, and octopus. Don t forget to finish with the gianduiotto (semifreddo) to end on a sweet note. I love the transformation that the Kitchen Table group completed. It s a beautiful space with such a great atmosphere and energy. Look around closely to see all the fine details they ve put into this bacaro. I ve already been there a couple of times within a week and a half  the food, room, and staff all make it a wonderful experience :) Big shoutout to Lisa, Emma, and Brad!
Delicious food and great service!  One of my favourites here is the Sbocciare - deliziosa!  The atmosphere is relaxed, good cocktails and Italian wines.
One of the best Italian food I ever had in Vancouver. Very fresh ingredients with great balance.  Service was great as well .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicole, We are so glad you enjoyed yourself. Thank you for going out of your way to let us know. See you soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and very warm, attentive service. The space feels much cozier and inviting than it did in previous incarnations. The Kitchen Table group has a new gem with a very unique feel.
Fantastic dining experience with outstanding food and staff. This hidden gem in Coal Harbour has a great, unpretentious atmosphere. Will definitely be going back!
Great wait staff and wonderful sommelier. Loved the cost and welcoming atmosphere. We will come again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tracey, We love 5 star reviews. Actually, we strive for them for every single guest experience. Glad you enjoyed yourself! We await your next visit! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Best suit for couple or group to socialize. Food is light, pare with good wine or just sparkling water. Parking: There is pay parking near by.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Manny, thanks so much for taking the time to leave a sweet 5 star review! We hope to see you back again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Went to Bacaro with my son, for dinner last night. The food was outstanding, as was our server. It reminded me of our meals in Italy! Worth every penny!!!
Great customer service and food is good too!! Nice little cozy spot
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Harsukhman, Thanks so much for the great review. We are very pleased you enjoyed everything. We hope to host you again soon! Jesse Thompson Bacaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: Excellent. This was a great spot to grab dinner. The venetian food was perfect, the servers were friendly and the ambiance was just right.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, So stoked to read a review like this. This is what keeps us going. We cant wait to have you back again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Great pasta and great service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Howie, We really appreciate the kind words. Please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: One of the best places if you wanna go somewhere that not everyone goes. If you are a wine person, ask John to help you guys. Thank me later
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Milad, Jon is definitely the wine guy. Glad you got to meet him. He cant wait to chat with you again soon and pour something fun! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: 10/10 experience. Fantastic food and wine recommendations by the staff. The ambiance was top tier. Would come back for more without a doubt!
Simple but very tasty for lunch. Will definitely return and explore other great menu selections.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi William, Thanks for this. We are launching a new lunch menu in the next few weeks. Please feel free to come and check out the new flavours! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: I love everything about this place   the Aperol Spritz in a bottle, the pasta with veal-and-pork ragu, the hazelnut semi-fredo, and the sunny graphics!
Very elevated food for a reasonable price. The best service I have received, staff were super friendly and helpful with explaining the dishes on the menu.
Fantastic food, dining, cozy interior.  Servers we friendly and attentive.  Only wish is it stayed open a little later
Great food and fantastic service  .definitely deserving of the honourable mention on the Michelin guide.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bass, So nice to hear some positive words regarding your experience. Please come join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere, Great food. Great selection of drinks. Very helpful staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jr Savio, We really appreciate the kind words. Thank you! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Enjoy an array of mouth watering, creative small plates at the cicchetti bar and a well crafted selection artisanal wines by the glass. TheBombDotCom!
Food was delicious and beautifully presented. Had the feature cocktail and it was really good. Wine selection was diverse without being overwhelming.  Service was excellent
Excellent spot for an authentic Italian lunch.
Elevated dining,  delish & unique selection of food & fantastic cocktails. Loved how authentically Italian the menu is
Amazing. The best place for a dinner You have to consider the size of the portion, theyre really small and quite expensive
I had the Carpaccio and Pomodoro it was so delicious and fresh. Casual atmosphere with fine dining quality food.
Thoughtful seasonal dishes, comforting and delicious. Great cocktails, friendly service
Food was awesome.  Thank you for the wonderful recommendations, Mr. Taylor!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Henry, Thank you for the awesome review! See you again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Went there for lunch on my birthday and it was fantastic as usual. The grilled cheese is to die for!
Great service, vibe and food. One of our favorite when we are in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jessie, We cant wait to have you back! Hopefully see you soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: excellent service and the flavours were very good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Syd, Thank you for this! Please join us again soon! Jesse Thompson General Manager Bacaro

reviews.review_text: Excellent Italian tapa bar with high quality ingredients and superb service by Lisa and Maisie.
